short_summary: Thisis a procurement for Office chairs and stools,
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: Rotary Chairs**

**Title:** Rotary Chairs 
**Reference Number:** cb-262-26480605
**Amendment Number:** 9
**Solicitation Number:** J069985

**Publication and Closing Dates:**
* **Publication Date:** 2023-10-13
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-10-27T14:00:00

**Contract Period:**
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-10-26
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-01-15

**Notice Information:**
* **Tender Status:** Expired
* **Procurement Category:** Goods
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Description:**
Statistics Canada seeks to procure rotary chairs and office seating to Ottawa, ON by January 15, 2024. This tender is open to pre-qualified suppliers who hold a Supply Arrangement (SA) under PWGSC Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-120001/H. Suppliers who do not hold a SA may also submit a bid, but must also submit an arrangement to the Supply Arrangement Authority (SAA) for evaluation.

**Security:**
There is no security associated with this requirement.

**Procurement Strategy:**
This procurement is set aside under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business. This procurement is also set aside from international trade agreements.

**Contact Information:**
For inquiries regarding this requirement, please contact Michael Peters at statcan.macsbids-smcsoumissions.statcan@statcan.gc.ca or 343576-9483.

**Attachments:**
The tender notice and attachments can be accessed at [url]: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22101/j069985---npp.pdf, https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22101/j069985-addendum-addenda-001.pdf, https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22101/j069985-addendum-addenda-002.pdf, and so on.

Note: The above rewriten entry is a result of my editting. I left out french translation in order to save some space, but actually that is supposedly a mandatory option based on paragraph title. I made a few changes, improvements here and there,
